landing.subtitle: subtitle can go here
landing.bodytext: Company bold text can go here, when you just enter fake copy in rapid-fire fashion, \nyou don't know what it really feels like to fill out that form.
landing.subtitle: 1st set of bullets
landing.bullet: As soon as you can, use real and relevant words
If your site or application requires data input, enter the real deal, and actually\ntype in text
If it's a name, type a real name - Flash is awesome
landing.subtitle: 2nd set of bullets
landing.bullet: Do as your customers do and you'll understand them better
When you really understand them better, and feel what they feel, you'll build a \nbetter interface
Also with bullet text use have have sub bullets:
landing.subbullet: Sub bullet text can sometimes need superscript<sup>2</sup>
